sentences.sentence: Many of the immigrants are well-educated.
sentences.translation: 许多移民受过良好的教育。

sentences.sentence: Employers are using immigrants as cheap labour.
sentences.translation: 雇主正在把移民当作廉价劳动力使用。

sentences.sentence: Large numbers of immigrants flooded into the area.
sentences.translation: 大批移民涌入了这个地区。
